detailsData.title: Specialized Representation
detailsData.content: Bay Area Bicycle Law is the only Northern California-based law firm to exclusively specialize in representing cyclists. Our attorneys have been helping injured cyclists since 2010 and understand how to investigate, prepare, and litigate bicycle accident cases.

detailsData.title: No Fee Promise
detailsData.content: There is absolutely no cost involved in hiring us to represent you unless and until we win. If we do not recover for you, you do not owe us anything.

detailsData.title: Dedicated Attorneys
detailsData.content: We don’t pass your case off to a paralegal. By assigning manageable caseloads, we can maintain a reputation for quality while still operating profitably.

detailsData.title: Maximizing Compensation
detailsData.content: We will properly evaluate your claim and seek to recover for you each and every category of compensation to which you are entitled.

subHeading: Dedicated to Bicycle Safety in Northern California
valueProp: Bay Area Bicycle Law is the only Northern California-based law firm to exclusively specialize in representing cyclists. Our attorneys have been helping injured cyclists since 2010 and understand how to investigate, prepare, and litigate bicycle accident cases.

testimonalData.text: Michael Stephenson is a brilliant attorney willing to think outside the box to get results for his clients, with a strong work ethic and dedication to his clients.
testimonalData.author: Noah K.

testimonalData.text: Clear communication throughout the process. I felt like I had a true advocate on my side which made an otherwise unpleasant experience much more manageable.
testimonalData.author: Madison S.

testimonalData.text: Michelle relieved me of a huge burden by handling all of the communications with the insurance company. She listened to my complaints, informed me of my options, and basically hand held me through the entire process.
testimonalData.author: Dennis B.
